#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

int main(){
    unsigned int t,n,i,arr[101],minimum,j,min,arr2[101];
    unsigned int* c;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(;t>0;t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        c = malloc(n*sizeof(int));
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            scanf("%d",&c[i]);
        }
        for(i=0;i<101;i++){
            arr[i]=0;
            arr2[i]=0;
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            minimum = c[i];
            for(j=0;j<n;j++){
                if(c[j]==minimum){
                    arr[i]+=1;
                }
            }
        }
        j=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(arr[i]==1){
                arr2[j] = c[i];
                j+=1;
                }
            }
        min = arr2[0];
        for(i=0;i<j;i++)
            if(min>arr2[i])
                min=arr2[i];
        printf("%d\n",min);
    }
    return 0;
}
